ul.li: Introduction - Provides an overview of WSO2 AppServer as instructions on how to install the WSO2 AppServer in Standalone mode
WSO2 AppServer Source Distribution - Provides instructions on how to build the WSO2 AppServer using the source distribution
Changing WSO2 AppServer Crypto Keys - Provides instructions on how to change the WSO2 AppServer SSL certificate
Management Console Guide - Describes some of the administrative options of the Management Console
Chad Sample Guide - Provides instructions on how to deploy and run the Chad sample
Commodity Quote Sample - Provides instructions on how to build and run the Commodity Quote sample
FlickrClient Sample Guide - Demonstrates WSO2 AppServer's ability to generate code for a WSDL 2.0 description and its ability to invoke a real world application RESTfully
JAXWS Sample Guide - Demonstrates JAXWS
JIBX Sample Guide - Demonstrates the JIBX binding
MTOM Sample Guide - Demonstrates MTOM
Mail Sample Guide - Demonstrates Mail transport support.
STS Sample Guide - Demonstrates Security Token Service included with AppServer
Trader Sample - Provides instructions on how to build and run the Trader sample
TinyURL Sample Guide - Demonstrates the ability of the WSO2 AppServer to handle both SOAP and REST by developing a Web service from which we can obtain shorter URLs when we submit long URLs
MEX Sample Guide - Demonstrates WSO2 AppServer's ability to enable services to support WS-MetadataExchange and how to use MEX to retrieve metadata from MEX supported services
Xfer Sample Guide - Demonstrates WSO2 AppServer's ability to enable services to support WS-Transfer
JSON Sample Guide - Demonstrates JSON Support in WSO2 Application Server
Client API Sample Guide - Demonstrates the Axis2 Client API.
WebApp Sample Guide - Demonstrates Web Application deployment support in WSO2 AppServer
Clustering AppServer - This document describes the AppServer clustering functionality and demonstrates it using examples.
WS-Security Scenarios - This document describes the default WS-Security scenarios supported by WSO2 AppServer.
Class Loading - This document describes the possible class loading patterns in WSO2 AppServer.
